alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Inland Jefferson; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 12:26AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gadsden, northern Jefferson, northeastern Leon, Decatur, Grady, Thomas, Brooks, Seminole and southeastern Colquitt Counties through 100 AM EDT... At 1225 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles west of Adel to 6 miles south of Coolidge to near Whigham to 12 miles southwest of Donalsonville. Movement was south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Moultrie, Thomasville, Quincy, Havana, Bainbridge, Donalsonville, Cairo, Quitman, Boston, Ochlocknee, Pavo, Coolidge, Whigham, Chattahoochee, Riverside, Greensboro, West Bainbridge, Gretna and Morven. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
